item.numina.component_parachute.desc: A mfe reusable parachute nke nwere ike deployed na gbakee na midair.
tooltip.numina.charging_base: Na-akwụ ụgwọ ihe ndị ụlọ ọrụ kwadebere
item.numina.component_ion_thruster.desc: N'N'ụzọ bụ isi a miniature urughuru accelerator. Accelerates ion ka nso-ìhè ọsọ na-emepụta thrust.
item.numina.component_laser_emitter.desc: A multicolored laser n'usoro nke nwere ike ọnụ ala ịgbanwe ọdịdị nke ihe.
item.numina.battery_elite.desc: Jikọta batrị kachasị elu iji chekwaa ike dị ukwuu.
item.numina.component_glider_wing.desc: Nku aerodynamic dị arọ nke nwere electromagnet maka ntinye ngwa ngwa na nkwụghachi.
item.numina.component_magnet.desc: Ngwaọrụ metal nke na-emepụta ndọta ndọta nke na-adọta ihe n'ebe onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ nọ.
tooltip.numina.changeModes: Mgbanwe ụdịdị: Press na jide ọnụ ọgụgụ nke hotbar oghere ike Fist bụ na.
item.numina.battery_ultimate.desc: Nnwale elu ọgwụgwụ ike nchekwa ngwaọrụ, ugbu a na fọrọ nke nta dịghị ohere nke gbawara (anyị na-eche). N'agbanyeghị asịrị ọjọọ, ọ bụghị dabere na teknụzụ ndị ọbịa zuru ezu.
item.numina.component_servo.desc: A pụrụ iche ụdị moto nke na-eji a usu-modulated mgbaàmà iwu nnọọ kpọmkwem mmegharị.
tooltip.numina.pressShift: Pịa SHIFT maka ozi ndị ọzọ.
item.numina.battery_advanced.desc: Jikọta batrị iji kwe ka ihe ahụ chekwaa ike.
item.numina.component_carbon_myofiber.de: Obere ngwugwu nke eriri carbon, nke a nụchara anụcha maka iji ya mee ihe na akwara ndị e kere eke.
tooltip.numina.noModules: Ọ dịghị arụnyere modul! Ihe a abaghị uru ruo mgbe ị gbakwunye ụfọdụ modulu na Tebụl Tinker.
item.numina.component_wiring.desc: A pụrụ iche ụdị wiring na elu voltaic ike na nkenke, dị mkpa maka mwute ngwá electronic na ike agha.
Installs modul n'ime họrọ modular ihe mgbe player bụ na okike mode
item.numina.component_myofiber_gel.desc: A oké, conductive mado, zuru okè n'ihi na kwesịrị ekwesị n'etiti myofibers na ihe wuru muscle.
Akwara eletrik, nke e kere eke, nke nwere obere mmegharị karịa akwara mmadụ ma iwu nke ịdị ukwuu karịa ike.
item.numina.component_control_circuit.de: A mfe networkable microcontroller maka ịhazi otu onye akụrụngwa.
item.numina.component_solar_panel.desc: Ngwaọrụ na-emetụ n'ahụ ọkụ nke ga-emepụta ọkụ eletrik site na anyanwụ.
item.numina.battery_basic.desc: Jikọta batrị iji kwe ka ihe ahụ chekwaa ike.
item.numina.component_rubber_hose.desc: A kpamkpam gwara mmanụ roba sooks ike iguzogide oké okpomọkụ ma ọ bụ oyi
item.numina.component_computer_chip.desc: Ihe kwalite akara circuit na e dere a CPU nke bụ ike nke ọzọ elu calculations.
item.numina.component_solenoid.desc: Wires ọnyá gburugburu a ferromagnetic isi na-emepụta a isi electromagnet.
item.numina.component_field_emitter.desc: Ngwaọrụ dị elu nke na-emegharị kpọmkwem mpaghara electromagnetic na ndọda na mpaghara.
